comment: This class is a lot of work. Dr. Bessette is kind and helpful. Her communication is outstanding and she answers very quickly. This class is not your average class when it comes to asynchronous work, so be prepared. I have learned a lot from this class and she is by far the best professor to take.(Trust me)

Dr. Bessette is caring and wants the best for her students. She is accessible any time of the day and any time of the week. The course was led through Dr. Driver through her videos so it wasn't really taught by Dr. Bessette but she is still sweet. There are a lot of assignments but if you take it online you can definitely stay ahead. Take her!

Be prepared to work in this class. The field experience is ALOT, the lesson plan is ALOT. This is not an easy A class. She responds quick to emails if you need help. You can redo the lesson plan if you do not like your grade. You can also redo two additional assignments. She grades fairly quickly

I had this professor for INED 3300 and it was terrible. She did not have clear instructions. I would email her and her emails were even more confusing. this class is also a 6000 level class and literally had me crying weekly because this class is too much. Don't take this class online if at all possible.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--So many papers

comment: Dr. Bessette was one professor that understood how to handle a heavy course load during a 6-week course. She was easy to access and clearly explained EVERYTHING!!! I would definitely take her again!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: She is understanding of situations such as text books being ordered at the beginning of the semester. She grades very quick and give good feedback. She will answer emails really quick as well.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Graded by few things--Caring

comment: I loved having her! Our class was so fun and she had wonderful stories! She walked us though all the projects and work!! She is seriously the sweetest person ever, if you have a chance take her!
